content: If I have multiple targets for a given source: are there any semantics implied by the order of the targets? Could the order of targets be used to infer preference ranking?
Do you mean the order in the ConceptMap definition or the result of a $translate?

@Jim Steel I thought of the definition itself, but probably $translate needs the same thing supported. @Grahame Grieve Thanks.

I'll file a tracker ... done J#25935
@Alexander Henket Could you provide one or more use case examples and maybe some additional explanation of what you need and why you believe you need it (for the discussion here and in the tracker)?

FHIR-NHG-map-example.xml

This is first trial version. @Feikje Hielkema I've substituted the Dutch stuff inside for English for ease of conversation.
